title: Fire And Smoke VFX Pack
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 12 Fire And Smoke sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/EIFLKDj0XzI


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 60 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● VFX 01_#[512,288].png 7580x4608

● VFX 02_#[512,288].png 7580x4896

● VFX 03_#[512,288].png 8192x4608

● VFX 04_#[512,288].png 8192x4879

● VFX 05_#[512,288].png 8192x5150

● VFX 06_#[512,288].png 7680x4896

● VFX 07_#[512,288].png 6656x4032

● VFX 08_#[512,288].png 6144x4032

● VFX 09_#[512,288].png 6656x4032

● VFX 10_#[512,288].png 8192x4896

● VFX 11_#[512,288].png 7680x4608

● VFX 12_#[512,288].png 7168x4608


Number of Textures: 12

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
